properties.areaDesc: Cortland; Madison; Otsego; Onondaga; Sullivan; Chenango; Delaware
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 5 at 3:52AM EST until February 6 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of
1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an
inch.

* WHERE...Onondaga, Madison, Cortland, Chenango, Otsego,
Delaware and Sullivan counties.

* WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions will impact the Thursday morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop late this evening, which
will transition to sleet and freezing rain late tonight into
Thursday morning. Valleys may get warm enough for freezing rain
to change to rain by late morning, but it may take until early
afternoon to get above freezing at higher elevations.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST THURSDAY
